Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n5hjrfkB3O1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1jmbofA"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/1b4956955893b5e61683f04596d9af52/tumblr_inline_n5hjs30s6f1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>If you’re late for work, what do you do? Set an alarm clock. If you’re wondering about the next maneuver node, what do you do? Set an alarm clock! <strong>TriggerAu</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1jmbofA"><strong>Kerbal Alarm Clock</strong></a> allows you to set up timing reminders that will help you hit the mark on events like maneuver nodes, transfers launch rendezvous and more. That’s just the tip of the iceberg on the useful features that can be found in an in-depth list <a href="http://bit.ly/1oKkvMb"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
One of the essential mods in every collection
Glad to see this getting some well deserved recognition.
this is a must have !! great mod that i could play without ^^
The more I use it the more confidently I launch and operate multiple vessels at the same time.

The only way to efficiently run multiple deep space missions at once.

Hell, you need it even if you don't leave Kerbin's SOI.
Kerbal Alarm Clock: Don't leave Kerbin's SOI without it.
How cool , Thanks for the recognition Mr Squad, and thanks for the kind comments fellow Kerbalnauts
